item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I learned Pascal twice in my life: once in high school and another time in the Technion as part of Programming Languages course (Pascal was the imperative language example)
item.content:encoded: I learned Pascal twice in my life: once in high school and another time in the Technion as part of Programming Languages course (Pascal was the imperative language example)

item.description: You used to program in Pascal, didn't you?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe... well, some people are just HARD CODE. Oops... I meant CORE.
item.content:encoded: Hehe… well, some people are just HARD CODE. Oops… I meant CORE.
